QuestData.Title: Summit of Fate
QuestData.Description: You've done well cleaving through their warriors, $n. I'd like you to investigate the summit of Jintha'Alor.$B$BWe were prepared for our fiercest battle there, to storm their dark altar, but it's too quiet. Not a sound. It could be a terrible trap, and someone strong should look into it first instead of all of us rushing in.$b$BAnd if it's not a trap... I'm very interested in finding out what happened up there. Bring me back any clues you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Spider Idols from the Vilebranch at the summit of Jintha'Alor.
QuestData.RewardText: Dead? All of them, around the altar? And you found these spider idols on them...$B$BA mass sacrifice. They threw their lives to Shadra.
